properties.name: camel.dataformat.json-jsonb.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable auto configuration of the json-jsonb data format. This is enabled by default.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.json-jsonb.object-mapper
properties.description: Lookup and use the existing Jsonb instance with the given id.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.json-jsonb.pretty-print
properties.description: To enable pretty printing output nicely formatted. Is by default false.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.json-jsonb.unmarshal-type-name
properties.description: Class name of the java type to use when unmarshalling
